snippet.title: Preparing My Game For Release... (Final Devlog!)
snippet.description:
The very last devlog for my indie game Will You Snail before launch!
➤ Wishlist Will You Snail on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1115050/Will_You_Snail/
➤ Join the Will You Snail Discord: https://discord.gg/G3mRDrK

A day in the life of an indie game developer:
(Shortly before releasing / publishing my game on Steam)
0:00 - Intro
0:20 - Work in the Morning
2:22 - Going for a Walk (and Rambling)
4:26 - Afternoon Hours
6:20 - Work in the Evening
7:34 - Wishlist my Dudes

➤ Join our creative game dev community on Discord: https://discord.gg/Ye6zzfQ

Hope you enjoy. :)
#gamedev #indiedev #devlog
